site.PS: Permission will be allocated to www user when a site is created with aaPanel

database.TP1: Sync Selected Database information to Server
database.TP2: Sync all Database information to Server

config.C3: For Security，Please Changing Alias, Default Port, User name and Password!
config.CY3: Binding a Domain to bind Panel;Warning：If a domain is bound to Panel, you'll have to access panel with Domain ONLY!
config.CY4: Set Authorized Access IP,Using (,) to split multiple IP;Warning：If Authorized IP is set, ONLY the PC with Authorized IP can access the Panel!
config.CY5: New Created Site will be saved to subdirectory by default!
config.CY6: Directory of Site and Database Backup!
config.CY7: Defualt IP is Internet IP. If you need use local virtual machine to test, please input Intranet IP of virtual machine!
config.SET_IPV6: Allow ipv6 access panel after turning on
config.SET_PANEL_SSL: Click to customize the panel certificate
config.CY13: seconds, If the user does not have any operation within
config.CY14: seconds, the panel will automatically exit
config.CY15: Panel Admin entrance. After setting, you can ONLY log in to the panel through the specified Security Entrance, e.g. /www_bt_cn
config.thread_ps: Unless more than 10 people/sec access the panel, the recommended value should not exceed 2. Note: >1 will cause the BT terminal plugin to be abnormal.

close.TITLE: The Panel is closed
close.H1: Sorry, Administrator turned off the Panel
close.P1: Command to turn it on: rm -f /www/server/panel/data/close.pl
close.NAME: BT-Panel
close.AUTHENTRY: Please use the correct entry to log in to the panel
close.AUTHERR_REASON_CONTENT: The current BT-Panel has turned on the Security Entrance Login. The newly installed machine will randomly assign an 8-digit Security Entrance. It can also be modified at the panel settings. If you have not recorded it or you don't remember it, you can use the following method to resolve the error
close.AUTHERR_RESOLVENT_CONTENT: Enter one of the following commands on the SSH terminal
close.AUTHERR_TACK_CARE: Note: [Turning off Security Entrance] will make your panel login address directly exposed on the Internet, which is very dangerous. Please be cautious.

crontab.PS: Type of task: Shell Script, Backup Site, Backup Database, Cut Log, Release Memory, Access URL
crontab.PS1: When adding a backup task, you should run it manually and check if the backup package is complete
crontab.PS2: Insufficient disk space, database password error, network instability, etc. may result in incomplete data backup

soft.PS: Upgrade to Pro edition, all plugins, free to use!。

install.TITLE: Initialize BT Software
install.PS1: |Makes it easier to use the server
install.PASS_CANT_EMPTY: Username or password cannot be empty!
install.PASS_NOT_SAME: The password entered twice are inconsistent, please re-enter!

login.N12: Verification Code will be displaied after 3 times of login error
login.QR_CORE_LOGIN: QR Code login with BT mini program
login.SCAN_MORE_SAFETY: QR code login is more secure
login.USER_LOGIN: Click on the account to login

menu.HELP: For Support|Suggestions, please visit the BT-Panel Forum

layout.tips1: The current IE browser version is too low to display some features, please use another browser. Or if you use a browser developed by a Chinese company, please switch to Extreme Mode!
